mutants.code:
def generate_multiplication_table(k):
    table = []
    for i in range(2, k):
        row = []
        z = i
        for j in range(1, k):
            p = z * j
            s = ''
            while p:
                s = str(p % k) + s
                p //= k
            row.append(s)
        table.append(row)
    return table

def generate_multiplication_table(k):
    table = []
    for i in range(1, k):
        row = []
        z = i
        for j in range(1, k):
            p = z * j

                s = str(p % k) - s
                p //= k
            row.append(s)
        table.append(row)
    return table

def generate_multiplication_table(k):
    table = []
    for i in range(1, k):
        row = []
        z = i
        for j in range(1, k):
            p = z * j
            s = ''
            while p:
                s = str(p + k) + s
                p //= k
            row.append(s)
        table.append(row)
    return table
